insight: Adopt an integrated drone data platform that auto‑ingests images, orthomosaics, and 3D models directly into BIM and construction management systems to eliminate manual uploads and data silos.
context: Anvil Labs reports that fragmented file formats and tedious manual uploads create bottlenecks when thousands of images are captured per flight, leading to delayed decisions and rework.

insight: Implement strict GCP placement guidelines—use high‑contrast targets, ensure even spatial distribution, and validate positions with RTK GPS—to prevent misalignment and accuracy loss in drone surveys.
context: Drone Survey Hub identifies inaccurate or insufficient GCPs as a major source of survey misalignment, recommending best‑practice placement and precision GPS verification.
